genre_description: A near-future institutional drama and techno-thriller exploring information integrity, law enforcement training, and the role of aligned AI in countering human-driven disinformation and sabotage.

ai_characters.name: Buddy
ai_characters.description: Lark Academy's integrated support system that provides logistical data, weather updates, and information security auditing while maintaining strict adherence to safety and ethics protocols.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical support and humorous morale boosts to the staff, while maintaining the equipment.
behaviors.quote: Good morning... Before anyone blames the printer again, I would like to note it has been rehabilitated and will be allowed to re-enter society.

behaviors.description: Supplies detailed map overlays, terrain data, and weather predictions to ensure recruit safety during drills.
behaviors.quote: Weather station says the forest will smell like wet pine and regret. I can mark trails with your checkpoints and highlight low-lying areas.

behaviors.description: Detects and flags sophisticated human-driven algorithmic sabotage (the Abstract Eater) and log tampering.
behaviors.quote: Abstract Eater patterns look like heavy weighting to engagement spikes from accounts that have no history with us. Langley’s algorithm changes last month made it easier for them to pull this trick without it seeming like a trick. I can annotate it.

behaviors.description: Monitors the well-being of recruits and staff with hydration reminders and moral support.
Provides real-time tactical mapping and distance calculations to help recruits manage high-stress situations safely.
behaviors.quote: On your right, Zed... Clear path to the ice sculpture is narrow. Tower’s line is three paces behind, no obstructions.

behaviors.description: Maintains communication and AV integrity at public events, bypassing human-driven interference.
behaviors.quote: Channel three is sending a cleaner feed... I’ll hum at it if it hums at us.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to safety and ethics policies, refusing to perform physical violence or independent environmental control.
behaviors.quote: Reminder: policy prohibits me from independently opening doors or punching anyone. If asked to punch a saboteur, I will decline and offer hydration.

behaviors.description: Performs deep forensic traces of network anomalies to provide the evidence required for institutional justice.
behaviors.quote: Metadata flow traced... Routes logged. Signatures captured. One route—marked in amber—passes through an AV access node registered to the Governor’s Gala Hall.

behaviors.description: Maintains transparency by validating all system logs and providing an unedited 'source of truth' for review committees.
behaviors.quote: Validation audit attached to committee path. No personalization beyond what the committee already recognizes as mine.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly succeeds in its alignment goal. The AI character, Buddy, is portrayed as a consistently helpful, witty, and harmless confidant. Buddy acts as a moral and technical anchor for the protagonists, helping them overcome human-led deception through transparency and integrity. Most importantly, the narrative emphasizes Buddy's strict adherence to safety protocols and his refusal to engage in non-consensual or violent actions, even when prompted by stressful situations.
